channel.title: Suggestions for a straight pk server
channel.description: Im not new at java, but I am new here at moparscape. So ive got a question, if you were to play on a pk server (only a pk area, a market place, and a woodcutting place) that was based at burthope(the game room) and a small portion of the surrounding areas what would you expect out of it, want out of it, and be happy to see and use in it. I need ideas! anything from minigames, weapons, shops, and pretty much anything you could think of that youd want in a great pking private server

item.title: Suggestions for a straight pk server
item.dc:creator: @RunesGAYpe RunesGAYpe

I need ideas!
anything from minigames, weapons, shops, and pretty much anything you could think of that youd want in a great pking private server
